title: Gems News for Watch
summary: News and Info designed for the Watch. Photo, title, and key points at a glance.
developerAddress:
800 W. El Camino Real, Ste. 180
Mountain View, CA 94040
description: Android watch users - get most important and interesting news on your watch twice a day. All news and info com with a photo, title, and key points, enabling users to get the info at a glance.  Perfectly designed for watch users.  No need to scroll. Phone users - get news and information in a concise manner. simple and clean. share with friends on social networks. listen to the news while driving or busy.  News and info are also displayed in this concise manner on the phone app, so that users can enjoy the benefits of concise reading without having a watch. Through artificial intelligence techniques and a lot of common sense, users get the most important info in the quickest manner.
descriptionHTML:
Android watch users - get most important and interesting news on your watch twice a day. All news and info com with a photo, title, and key points, enabling users to get the info at a glance. Perfectly designed for watch users. No need to scroll.

Phone users - get news and information in a concise manner. simple and clean. share with friends on social networks. listen to the news while driving or busy.

News and info are also displayed in this concise manner on the phone app, so that users can enjoy the benefits of concise reading without having a watch.

Through artificial intelligence techniques and a lot of common sense, users get the most important info in the quickest manner.
comments: Awesome News App Its difficult to stay up to date with the latest news but this app makes it so simple! It has the most important stories of the day in a simple reader friendly interface. I also love the voice reading functionality!
Most useful app I have. Love it. I use this all the time. Love the features....
This app is simply brilliant. thumbs up guys!
Very useful app no doubt ! Wonderful creation
recentChanges: - Listen to News by Tapping on Watch
